instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820 3208 A , shut down off after 40 - 60 sec
threads.message:
Working on 3208 board, without any liquid damage or corrosion.. this board was been in another store and some asshole heat the <CHIP>U1800</CHIP>!! 

i already replace the bios, and cooler but same history!! i already double check for knockout components but seems to me everything is ok ! 


what can it be?? 

thank you

threads.title: 820 3208 A , shut down off after 40 - 60 sec
threads.message: Flash SPI chip with clean ME BIOS...

threads.title: 820 3208 A , shut down off after 40 - 60 sec
threads.message:
already replace a bios with one fresh clean me.. replace the IC bios for a other one, same history! i check again for missing components but it seems okay.. 

After 60-80sec shut down .. For turn on again i need to unplug the charge and put them again!

threads.title: 820 3208 A , shut down off after 40 - 60 sec
threads.message: If board was f**d before, you may waste yor time for nothing...

threads.title: 820 3208 A , shut down off after 40 - 60 sec
threads.message: Ya you right!! i will replace the chip <CHIP>U1800</CHIP> and reprogram again the bios with a clean me if don't solve i will leave this machine!! thank you !! you can close the post!!
